title: Will Not Support Israeli Strike On Iran's Nuclear Sites, Says Joe Biden
content: US President Joe Biden said on Wednesday that he would not support any Israeli strike on Iran's nuclear sites in response to its missile attack and urged Israel to act "proportionally."
summary: US President Joe Biden said on Wednesday that he would not support any Israeli strike on Iran's nuclear sites in response to its missile attack and urged Israel to act "proportionally."

title: Explained: How Significant Is Russia's Capture Of Ukraine's Vuhledar?
content: Russian troops are in complete control of the town of Vuhledar in Ukraine's eastern Donetsk region that has resisted Russian assaults for more than two years, the SHOT Telegram channel and pro-Russian war bloggers said on Wednesday.
summary: Russian troops are in complete control of the town of Vuhledar in Ukraine's eastern Donetsk region that has resisted Russian assaults for more than two years, the SHOT Telegram channel and pro-Russian war bloggers said on Wednesday.

title: "Will Have A Stronger Response" If Israel Retaliates: Iran President
content: President Masoud Pezeshkian insisted Wednesday that Iran was "not looking for war" but pledged a stronger response if Israel retaliates for its missile attack.
summary: President Masoud Pezeshkian insisted Wednesday that Iran was "not looking for war" but pledged a stronger response if Israel retaliates for its missile attack.

title: Hamas "Takes Responsibility" For Attack That Killed 7 In Israel's Tel Aviv
content: The armed wing of Hamas claimed responsibility on Wednesday for a shooting and stabbing attack that killed seven people in Israeli commercial hub Tel Aviv the previous day.
summary: The armed wing of Hamas claimed responsibility on Wednesday for a shooting and stabbing attack that killed seven people in Israeli commercial hub Tel Aviv the previous day.

title: G7 Members "Unequivocally" Condemn Iran's Missile Attack On Israel
content: The United States and G7 members "unequivocally" condemn Iran's missile attack on Israel, the White House said Wednesday, and are considering new sanctions.
summary: The United States and G7 members "unequivocally" condemn Iran's missile attack on Israel, the White House said Wednesday, and are considering new sanctions.

title: Explained: How Israel Might React To Iranian Missile Attack?
content: Israel's pledge to respond to a massive missile strike from Iran has sent diplomats scrambling for ways to avert a full-blown regional war.
summary: Israel's pledge to respond to a massive missile strike from Iran has sent diplomats scrambling for ways to avert a full-blown regional war.

title: US Girl, 13, Allegedly Killed Sister, 7, After Fight Over "Flushing Toilet"
content: A 13-year-old girl in the US has been accused of stabbing her 7-year-old sister to death following an argument over flushing the toilet.
summary: A 13-year-old girl in the US has been accused of stabbing her 7-year-old sister to death following an argument over flushing the toilet.

title: Iran's Supreme Leader Warned Hezbollah Chief Before Israeli Strike: Report
content: Iran's Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei warned Hezbollah leader Syyed Hassan Nasrallah to flee Lebanon days before he was killed in an Israeli strike, three Iranian sources said.
summary: Iran's Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei warned Hezbollah leader Syyed Hassan Nasrallah to flee Lebanon days before he was killed in an Israeli strike, three Iranian sources said.

title: Russia Captures Vuhledar After 2 Years Of Ukrainian Resistance
content: Russian troops on Wednesday took charge of the eastern Ukrainian town of Vuhledar, a bastion that had resisted intense attacks since Russia launched its full-scale assault in 2022.
summary: Russian troops on Wednesday took charge of the eastern Ukrainian town of Vuhledar, a bastion that had resisted intense attacks since Russia launched its full-scale assault in 2022.

title: PM Modi Wishes Israeli Counterpart Netanyahu On Jewish New Year
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi has extended wishes to his Israeli counterpart Benjamin Netanyahu, people of Israel and Jewish community across the world on the occassion of Rosh Hashanah.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi has extended wishes to his Israeli counterpart Benjamin Netanyahu, people of Israel and Jewish community across the world on the occassion of Rosh Hashanah.

title: Exclusive: What's Next For Israel After Iran Missile Attack? Envoy Explains
content: Iran's attack on Israel wasn't just a barrage of missiles, it was a barrage of 181 ballistic missiles, each having a warhead payload of between 700-1,000 kilograms. It is unprecedented, Israel's Ambassador told NDTV.
summary: Iran's attack on Israel wasn't just a barrage of missiles, it was a barrage of 181 ballistic missiles, each having a warhead payload of between 700-1,000 kilograms. It is unprecedented, Israel's Ambassador told NDTV.

title: "Only Heartbreak": Israel Woman Killed While Shielding 9-Month-Old Son
content: Israeli officials reported that the brave woman shielded her child from harm, giving her life to protect her infant.
summary: Israeli officials reported that the brave woman shielded her child from harm, giving her life to protect her infant.

title: Fugitive Hate Preacher Zakir Naik Meets Pakistani PM Shehbaz Sharif
content: Wanted for alleged money laundering charges, controversial Islamic hate preacher Zakir Naik met Pakistan Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Thursday.
summary: Wanted for alleged money laundering charges, controversial Islamic hate preacher Zakir Naik met Pakistan Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Thursday.

title: Japan Airport Shut After World War II Bomb Explodes Near Runway
content: According to Japan's Transport Ministry, a bomb disposal team confirmed the explosion was caused by an American bomb buried beneath the surface, dating back to a wartime air raid.
summary: According to Japan's Transport Ministry, a bomb disposal team confirmed the explosion was caused by an American bomb buried beneath the surface, dating back to a wartime air raid.

title: 5-Year-Old Boy In US Goes Into Cardiac Arrest While On Disney World Ride
content: A US family's outing at Walt Disney World turned into a nightmare after their 5-year-old son collapsed while riding on one of the theme park's thrilling attractions.
summary: A US family's outing at Walt Disney World turned into a nightmare after their 5-year-old son collapsed while riding on one of the theme park's thrilling attractions.

title: China Woman Forges Medical Certificates To Obtain Leave, Fined Rs 3 Lakh

title: The Bold And Brave India-US Partnership

title: China Man Refuses Divorce, Flees Courtroom With His Wife On Back
content: He lifted Chen off the floor and fled the courtroom with her on his back, leaving his wife screaming.

title: Explained: Israel's Tiered Missile Defence Systems vs Iranian Arsenal
content: What kinds of weapons Iran used to strike Israel on Tuesday night? Iran has an arsenal of ballistic and cruise missiles and drones, which have been used in the recent past to target Israel.

title: A Brief History Of Israel, Palestine - Understanding A Decades-Old Conflict
content: Israel and Hamas have been waging war since gunmen from the Palestinian militant group in the Gaza Strip stormed into southern Israel on Oct. 7, killing 1,200 people and capturing 253 hostages, by Israeli tallies.
summary: Israel and Hamas have been waging war since gunmen from the Palestinian militant group in the Gaza Strip stormed into southern Israel on Oct. 7, killing 1,200 people and capturing 253 hostages, by Israeli tallies.
